Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Designed to develop an understanding of musical principles and techniques for listening to music, with Honors content.

MUL2014 - Introduction to Music History.name: MUL2014 - Introduction to Music History and Literature

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Musical repertories and cultures from the Western art music tradition, American jazz, and non-western music.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Music in cross-cultural context. Relation of music to religion and society.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Survey of jazz literature and performance.

MUL3024 - Welcome to the Jungle: Hard Ro.name: MUL3024 - Welcome to the Jungle: Hard Rock

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: A survey of hard rock and heavy metal music and culture in the 1980s.

MUL2721 - Survey of Latin American Music.name: MUL2721 - Survey of Latin American Music

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Survey of Latin-American and Caribbean music, including musical traditions as well as historical and cultural connections.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Survey of music written for percussion instruments.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Overview of classical guitar literature, history, and pedagogy from the Renaissance to the present.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: "C" (2.0) or better in MUH 3211 and MUH 3212, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Choral music from its beginnings to the present with consideration of historical perspective; genres, styles, and performance practice, major composers, and representative works.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Classical song repertoire in English and common foreign languages, and proven methods of effective song study.

MUL3385 - Analysis of Hard Rock & Heavy.name: MUL3385 - Analysis of Hard Rock & Heavy Metal

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An analytical discourse of hard rock and heavy metal in the 1980s, a period where the genres enjoyed their highest degree of popularity.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Important literature written for brass instruments, and basic concepts and techniques to teach brass.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Designed to develop an understanding of musical principles and techniques for listening to music.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Important literature written for woodwind instruments, and basic concepts and techniques to teach woodwinds.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Important literature written for string instruments, and basic concepts and techniques to teach string.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Survey of stringed keyboard literature from the 16th century to the present, with emphasis on technical, formal and performance problems.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Survey of materials for use in the public school band classroom, including beginning band methods, technique books, and musical selections appropriate for concert performance.
